caption.p: The inhibitory effect of Satureja khuzistanica calluses on FSK growth. (A) The effects of callus on FSK diameter growth during 6 days. At above ns ( p > 0.05), *( p < 0.05), shows the result of separate analysis of variance at each day between control and callus treatment. Bars represent means ± SD, (B, C) Decrease the growth of FsK in the vicinity of the Satureja khuzistanica callus.
